Title: XSS in key names
Description: Swagger-ui contains a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the key names for the following object path in the JSON document: `.definitions.{USER_DEFINED}.properties.{INJECTABLE_KEY_NAME}`. Supplying a key name with script tags causes arbitrary code execution. In addition it is possible to load the arbitrary JSON files remotely via the `URL` query-string parameter.
